summary: REQ-8 appears implemented by updating the contactInfo WhatsApp and phone values in frontend/src/components/landing/landingContent.ts to the requested number (included with +91 country code). However, the diff summary does not show changes in the actual button/link construction (e.g., ContactSection.tsx), so link-click behavior cannot be fully verified from the provided evidence. Two additional files were modified that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/modified frontend-file-summaries.txt (project documentation/summary) even though the BuildRequest only asked to update the contact number in landingContent.ts.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested changes to documentation or file summaries.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project_state.json (project state metadata) though the BuildRequest did not request any project state/version metadata changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested editing project_state.json; requested change was limited to updating contact number in landing content.
